Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans Pelicans coach Willie Green discussed the suspension of Zion Williamson due to team policy violations before the game against the Philadelphia 76ers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zion Williamson showed his return attempt with a 360-degree dunk against the Minnesota Timberwolves, symbolizing his recovery from a long injury absence.
Others: The Pelicans also announced the suspension of forward Herb Jones due to a shoulder injury, adding to their lineup concerns for the game against the 76ers.
